title: Why Coming Out is Sacred in the Attention Economy: Why Buzz words are Holy Words
description:
​@Carefree Wandering as Grizwald Grim noticed got attention by making a video about @Philosophy Tube  and his timing was perfect. To critique an examplar of trans-physicalism will be both punished and rewarded in the Attention Economy. But why? 

I've been working on upper and lower register videos for a bit now and finding it a helpful way to map and track "the religious" within us. Durkheim's "homo duplex" in many ways maps onto the upper and lower register facilitating the emergence of "the holy" among us. 

https://twitter.com/GrimGriz/status/1449938433946890240
Commodification of Philosophy https://youtu.be/0RmJO2IwHek
Kant's Ideas: Do they matter? A New Enlightenment  https://youtu.be/h0nkLovWA1M
Kant's Ethics https://youtu.be/IrB5XN_Qw_0
Wokism critique https://youtu.be/cwQpcG8T1fo
Wokism about Transcending the Physical https://youtu.be/jSRmHqzB6Ew
Two World's Mythology and Heavenly and Earthly Registers https://youtu.be/PE1ztKfTwcY
High on God https://amzn.to/3ASFmay

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/XF4w6deK
Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

My Substack https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/
